overview: Modern girls don’t mess around, they know what they want, when they want it, and you know how Private girls are, they’re addicted to anal! Urban life offers the best opporutinities for our anal loving nymphos, and amidst the concrete jungle, they really come out to play... Rebecca Volpetti is getting married tomorrow, but she’s free today, so… why not? Marilyn Sugar has run into her literature teacher at the park, so… why not? Freya Dee has left her dildo at her friend’s house and is having him bring it over, so… why not? And Misha Maver has gone to see her therapist after a rough break-up, so… why not? Anal sex everywhere and anywhere is the mantra for our girls in Private Specials, Urban, Sexy and Anal Loving, so ask yourself… why not?!
title: Urban, Sexy And Anal Loving
